H0.text: According to legend, who was King Arthur's father. Urian

H1.text: According to legend, who was King Arthur's father. Gorlois

H2.text: According to legend, who was King Arthur's father. Cerdic

H3.text: According to legend, who was King Arthur's father. Üther

A4.text: Uther Pendragon and Arthur here appear as the scions of the junior branch of an unattested House of Anjou.

A5.text: Uther Pendragon ( (Y)OO-thər pen-DRAG-ən; the Brittonic name; Welsh: Uthyr Pen Ddraig, Uthyr Pendragon or Uthr Bendragon), also known as King Uther (or Uter), was a legendary King of the Britons and father of King Arthur.
